Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory759.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'The noise from the depths of space buzzes in your ears. For some reason, every time you silently recite this name, countless strange silhouettes appear in your mind.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1021.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/UiFightDetailMapBg.png', 4: '4'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5101_13.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1023.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory646.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3002_34.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgUi/BgFightLoading46.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{3: 'But whenever you try to figure out what they represent, your mind goes blank again.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory584.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTheatre3/FxUiTheatre3PlayMainScreenRedEx.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png'}
{1: '<size=38>>></size>', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '<size=38>>>Search Core: <color=#ff4e4eff>Backup Frame Capriccio</color></size>', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1'}
{1: '<size=38>>>Details: <color=#ff4e4eff>no registration info</color></size>', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1'}
{1: '<size=38>>>Current Location: <color=#ff4e4eff>Conservation Area 221 Warehouse</color></size>', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1'}

{1: '<size=38>>>Frame Processing Status: <color=#ff4e4eff>Pending Destruction (180:03:31)</color></size>', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1'}

{1: '<size=38>>>Process Registered By: <color=#ff4e4eff>Control Court - Ishmael</color></size>', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory584.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTheatre3/FxUiTheatre3PlayMainScreenRedEx.prefab'}
{2: 'A Babylonia backup frame, stored in... a conservation area warehouse?', 3: '55'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "...I think we've found the issue.", 4: '1'}
{2: "We have three hours until it's destroyed. Let's head to the warehouse now.", 3: '58'}

{2: 'Teddy', 3: "—Temporary communication channel established. I've created a combat mission under the Science Council's dispatch authority. I'll assist you in accessing Conservation Area 221's surveillance systems.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'As for Ishmael...', 3: '60'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I'll use the Science Council's authority to block her surface access request and stop Ishmael from reaching Conservation Area 221 before you do—I'm on my way to her now.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory759.jpg'}
{3: 'This name... This... Construct, what does she know? What role did she play in this crazy "journey"? And does she know...'}
{3: 'How can I return to that timeline?'}
{3: "Iris's smile seems to appear before you."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5301_15.jpg'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "Nights are short during summer. Let's meet before night if we can't make it at dawn."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory759.jpg'}
{3: '...We need to make it in time. We must hurry...'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory761.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory761.jpg'}
{3: 'The transport ship quickly takes off toward Babylonia—distant, yet not so distant.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory463.jpg'}
{1: 'Babylonia', 2: 'Control Court'}
{1: '1', 3: "Ishmael sits at a table. An iris flower is hovering above her hand. It's data that's so exquisitely crafted, it almost looks real."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'So this bit of power has been given to you...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'It almost affects even me... This is truly incredible.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The iris flower slowly rotates. The dots of light gradually outline the scene where "Iris" and the commandant stand in confrontation.'}
{3: "When Teddy asked why she wanted to destroy the Capriccio frame, Ishmael had almost forgotten the reason—until she touches the device that doesn't belong here."}
{3: 'That device the Science Council named "White Noise".'}
{3: 'Memories sealed away by twisted timelines awaken in her Deep M.I.N.D. Ishmael narrows her eyes, her pupils radiating with strange colors.'}
{3: 'The Control Court receives a rare visitor.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: "I know it's you... Merciful One, I can sense it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl looks at the pink-haired woman in front of her with eager yet sorrowful eyes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'So direct... Just call me Ishmael.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The door gently closes as an invisible, strange force distorts the space, preventing cameras from peering into the scene here.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: 'Ishmael... my lady.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'I... I would like to ask for your assistance.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'From what I know, you\'ve acquired a new frame... called "Pianissimo", right? It\'s a fine name.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "If you're trying to revert back to a Construct... I'm sorry, but the Punishing has already invaded your M.I.N.D. This is irreversible, and even I am powerless to reverse it.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Two cups of coffee silently materialize on the table, their rich aroma filling the air.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Thank goodness, you still remember me...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She exhales deeply, then settles uneasily into her chair.'}
{3: 'Ishmael displays a perfect look of confusion.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "I'll never forget everything you've done for me, and I'm not here to ask for that. What I want to ask is...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Please tell me how to stop that red-haired invader who calls herself Enora Lueya.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'You must have heard it, too... that "voice."', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ishmael quietly picks up her coffee, dropping four sugar cubes into it. The calm surface breaks, rippling outward.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory536.jpg'}
{1: 'Conservation Area 221', 2: 'Some time earlier.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: 'Conductor... This way!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}

{3: 'Sharp gunshots tear through the quiet forest, sending birds scattering. The red-haired pursuer is hit, but she seems unconcerned. She continues to track the pair after discarding the damaged parts of herself.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: 'How could this be...', 4: '1'}
{2: "She's become stronger.", 3: '154'}
{3: 'You carefully check your protective suits for any damage while hiding in the bushes. You hold your breath as you move with Selena in a different direction.'}

{3: 'A few days ago, while on a surface mission with Selena escorting the Archaeological Team, a Construct who called herself Enora Lueya appeared out of nowhere, and pointed her weapon at you without a word.'}
{3: 'With Selena\'s help, you managed to drive off this "Construct", but Babylonia couldn\'t find any information about her at all.'}
{3: 'While Babylonia had made the incident a top priority and was investigating her identity, this "Enora Lueya" showed up again.'}
{3: 'How did she "resurrect" herself, and how did she evade Babylonia\'s investigation and track you into the conservation area?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: "You have no time to think. Your enemy's footsteps are just inches away..."}
{2: '(Stand up and open fire)', 3: '166'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The cold Construct points her weapon at you, but before she can strike, Selena attacks her from behind...', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySlash.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{3: 'Just like before, she is easily defeated. Her armor scatters across the ground.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Conductor... Are you alright?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Selena rushes over, examining the wounds on your body.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "You've lost so much blood...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'You quickly dress your wounds as Selena watches blood seep through the white gauze with sorrow in her eyes.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'It must hurt so much... to lose this much blood...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'She takes out the bandages and gently blows on your wound, before applying medicine with the utmost care.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Yeah... just like last time, she is shattered into pieces.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'What is she trying to do...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'She wants to kill me.', 3: '204', 4: 'She wants me dead.', 5: '204'}
{3: 'This is obvious, but you have no idea why.'}
{3: "After reporting the incident, nobody could find any information whatsoever about this Construct. What's strange is that she always manages to track you down."}
{3: "What's even weirder is..."}
{2: 'I was on Babylonia, but when I woke up...', 3: '208'}
{2: 'I was in this conservation area.', 3: '209'}

{3: 'You check your terminal and find out you have been dispatched to the surface for a ground mission. This is a mission to investigate an "unidentified Ascendant" that showed up near the conservation area.'}
{3: 'She takes out her terminal, which shows the exact same mission: "Investigate the unidentified Ascendant".'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory463.jpg'}
{3: "The faint mist rising from the coffee becomes transparent in the sunlight, as dust dance like musical notes in the window frame's shadow."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Ishmael stares at the girl as she anxiously recounts her recent experiences.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'After that... the same events seem to keep repeating.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'I heard the jumbled sounds of time distortion. It sounded like Lueya was... somehow using the "past" to do something.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: '"The past"?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "Yes. That day, when Conductor was injured, I led her in a different direction, trying to divert Lueya's attention, but she...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'I used the Punishing to capture notes from the past, just like how I used to read the Red Tide.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The next second, she appeared in the "past."'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'So this bit of power has been given to you...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "That's why you looked blurry even to me, and I could barely remember who you were.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Ishmael chuckles quietly, taking a small sip of coffee that has just the right sweetness.'}
{3: 'Having interfered with the workings of this world, she had to pay a price to stop "Them" from noticing this place.'}
{3: 'But she wasn\'t expecting part of the power that she scattered as the "price" to be absorbed by Selena, whose core she reshaped.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'How interesting...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'She is enjoying watching this dramatic story unfold.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'What happened next? What did you see?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'I found out that Lueya was also in the "past." She seemed to be trying to modify the "past."', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Lueya used her identity to disguise herself as an "unidentified Ascendant" to attack the conservation area. She eventually figured out Babylonia\'s action patterns through her many attacks.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Selena', 3: 'When an "unidentified Ascendant" appears, Babylonia would send the nearest commandant and Constructs over. By deducing where they would appear, she could find the conductor...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lost, Selena clenches her fingers.'}
{3: 'However tough her enemies might be, she had always believed in her ability to overpower them. But what if the enemy never stops coming across countless timelines?'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'I came to ask you how I could... defeat Lueya?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Who is she?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Enora Lueya...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Setting down her coffee cup, Ishmael ponders for a moment.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I heard you like flowers, but do you understand giant trees?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Giant... trees...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'When branches grow abundant and the crown becomes massive, if the foliage is not and heavy snow gathers, the whole tree may collapse.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Only by trimming away some branches can the main trunk continue to grow upward.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'The trimmed "branches" are destined to wither, but...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'The "branches" don\'t know that.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'To the branches, they are their own "main trunk."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Is Conductor... the one who trims the "branches"?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rumors that the Gray Raven Commandant has been dealing with post-war trauma are nothing new.'}
{3: 'Ishmael answers with a smile.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: '...My ability to stabilize my M.I.N.D. and recover my memories was also because of Conductor...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Too many voices are mixed in the "tide," making it impossible to find the correct information.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'That was indeed the reason for your quick recovery.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'But... a killer from the "future"...', 4: '2'}
{3: "Ishmael isn't surprised that the red-haired Construct has the power of regression, but doesn't know the extent of it."}
{3: 'When branches fall, they cannot see their sad fate and can only try to "correct" what they consider to be the "wrong" timeline.'}

{3: 'Before Gray Raven absorbed the information from the Hetero Tower, branches inside the tower were already stacked high, as precarious as a pile of eggs. These "branches" incubated countless "futures."'}
{3: 'Although the fate of all branches is annihilation, it\'s not surprising that some could incubate "futures" with technology surpassing the current Babylonia.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Is this the first challenge you'll have to face in the final world?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'She murmurs to herself.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Enora Lueya, her "true form"... is most likely hidden in a more distant "past."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Only the "past" can influence the "present," so defeating her at this point in time is meaningless.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: '...In any case, if you know a way to deal with her, please tell me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "I'm willing to pay any price I can for the answer.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ishmael smiles as she gives her an "answer."'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Locate the coordinates where she appears, travel back to before she arrives, and stop everything she intends to do.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "But doing so will remove you from the normal timeline, and you already know the price you'll have to pay.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'You will be forgotten.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'But once I go back to the past, won\'t I also affect the "past"?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'If you affect the "past," the "present" may change as well. Once a butterfly\'s wings flutter, there\'s no predicting what kind of storm they might unleash.'}
{3: "She doesn't mind being forgotten, but she does care... whether it would affect the world where Conductor is."}
{3: 'Though it might sound easy, but...'}
{3: 'Conductor must have paid an incredible price for this.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'That depends on how you do it.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'If you can get there before her every time, stop her, and make everything disappear...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Then the "past" won\'t affect the "present."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "But... I don't know what would happen if I failed.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'If you have actually obtained part of that power, maybe you could try time slicing...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'She thinks for a moment, then gently shakes her head.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "That wouldn't be the ideal, either. We'll need to find Lueya's original body for the time loop to seal her within it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'But... how can I find her original body? That becomes another problem.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: '...Thank you. I know what to do now.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Selena stands up and bows deeply to Ishmael.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'So, please help me... tie up the loose ends of this "finale."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: '...What do you want to do?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "I'll pursue Enora Lueya until I catch her original form.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Back when the Pianissimo frame was being created, a backup Capriccio frame was stored away.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl looks up, her face tinged with both sorrow and determination.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'If being forgotten is my fate, please help me by destroying the "Capriccio" frame.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: '...As you wish.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Selena lets out a relieved sigh and hurriedly thanks her again.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "I must thank you for your selflessness. If I manage to return... I'll do everything in my power to help you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Time is running out. I must go now.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her fingers pause on the doorknob as she casts a reluctant glance out the window.'}
{3: 'A moment later, she firmly opens the door and walks out of the Control Court and into the setting sun.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Good luck.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The trailing sounds of her words stretch like threads, turning into the shape of harp strings in the shadows of sunlight.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'So here we are...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The iris made of data slowly spins as its dots of light gradually dissipate.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Using the damage Lueya has inflicted on the world as coordinates to pinpoint the timeline where Lueya's true form exists, and creating fragmentary loops...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "It looks like you've made up your mind...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Footsteps suddenly appear in the hallway, and seconds later, an urgent knock rattles the door.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Come in.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Standing at the doorway is none other than the commandant who confronted "Iris" in the data projection moments ago.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Gray Raven... 【kuroname】, I knew you would come.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Seated at the table, Ishmael, is wearing an odd smile.'}
{3: 'For some reason, that smile feels strangely familiar, yet like the bizarre silhouettes, whenever you try to place it, your mind goes completely blank.'}
{3: 'But now isn\'t the time to dwell on that. Casting aside your doubts, you take out the "Capriccio" frame destruction records Teddy found and put them in front of Ishmael.'}
{2: 'I need an explanation, Ishmael.', 3: '335'}
{2: 'The origin of this frame, and why you wanted to destroy it.', 3: '336'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "If you had come any earlier, I wouldn't have been able to give you an answer.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "As it happens, I've just recovered some interesting memories.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Besides, this isn't your only question, right?", 4: '2'}
{3: "You fall silent, then pull out a chair and sit down, before meeting Ishmael's gaze."}
{2: 'Why does this frame look exactly like Iris?', 3: '341'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Some secrets need to be kept. I can only tell you the basics.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Her silvery-white pupils shimmer with strange iridescence. For some reason, the longer you look at her, the dizzier you become.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Because I'm not the one who authored the rest of the story.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'On her desk, an iris flower made of data slowly takes shape.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "You've already met Enora Lueya.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'The one who distorts history.', 3: '347', 4: 'A criminal against time itself.', 5: '347'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Yes and no. That is indeed her goal, but now all of Enora Lueya's actions have become indirect.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Because her true target is now under protection.', 4: '2'}
{2: "You're saying...", 3: '350', 4: '...What are you trying to say?', 5: '350'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "That's right. You are, in fact, Enora Lueya's target.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory541.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Iris', 3: "We were the first to discover Enora Lueya's existence, and we've been fighting for a long time to stop her from disrupting history.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "...To be frank, if we had been a bit faster, this would likely have been resolved already, and you wouldn't have been dragged into it.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory463.jpg'}
{2: '...This is different from what I know.', 3: '365'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Of course, you've successfully returned to the present, so you trust Iris's statements more.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She smiles gently as she picks up the iris flower.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Let me guess, Iris told you...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'You just need to defeat Enora Lueya...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'It will all be over...', 3: '370'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory541.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Iris', 3: "...Relax. This war is almost over. I'm executing the final... and most critical mission—escorting the target to the designated location.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: 'If all goes according to plan, Enora Lueya will be waiting for me there. Once I defeat her, everything will be fine.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "As for returning... you don't need to worry about that...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Iris hesitates, then quickly begins to explain, as if she's just made up her mind about something."}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "Once I complete the final mission, I'll destroy her main body, and get the new device.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "By then, I'll be able to send you back to where you came from by using duplicates to traverse through time.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory463.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'So, on this journey with Iris, have you seen... or rather, do you remember what Enora Lueya looks like?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I mean, besides that massive metal form.', 4: '1'}
{3: "A smile ripples across her face as Ishmael's fingers crush the iris flower in her hand. It shatters and scatters away."}
